蹑 蹑 蹑
niè
to walk on tiptoe; to walk quietly; to tread (on); to follow
ходить на цыпочках; ходить спокойно; наступать (на); следовать

(Simplified: 蹑)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: To walk 足 quietly 聶; 聶 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 足 [ zú ] foot; to attain, to satisfy; enough
    • 聶 [ niè ] to whisper; surname
①踩，踏：“張良、陳平躡漢王足”。躡足。
②追蹤，跟隨，輕步行走的樣子：追躡。躡蹤。躡手躡腳。
躡手躡腳 [ niè shǒu niè jiǎo ]: to walk quietly on tiptoe (idiom)
躡足 [ niè zú ]: to walk on tiptoe; to step on sb's foot; to join (a trade, profession etc); to associate with (a certain group of people)
躡悄悄 [ niè qiāo qiāo ]: softly; quietly
躡蹤 [ niè zōng ]: to follow along behind sb (formal writing)
躡屩擔簦 [ niè juē dān dēng ]: to make a long journey (idiom)

躡字的基本解释

躡
niè
见“蹑”。

躡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》尼輒切，入葉，娘。］
亦作“1”。“蹑1”的繁体字。
(1)踩；踏。
(2)穿鞋。
(3)攀登；登上。
(4)到；前往。
(5)追踪；追击。
(6)超越；胜过。
(7)辗压。
(8)效法。
(9)连接；连续。
(10)指继承；承袭。
(11)抬起脚后跟，用脚尖走路。
(12)古代织机上提综的踏板。
(13)用同“捏”。
(14)用同“攝”。揭起。

躡字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　躡； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1236第27
【廣韻】【正韻】尼輒切【集韻】【韻會】昵輒切，?音聶。【說文】蹈也。【揚子·方言】躡，登也。【釋名】躡，攝也。登其上使攝服也。【博雅】履也。又急也。【史記·秦始皇紀】躡足行伍之閒。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guangyun" Ni Noir cuts into the leaves, mother. ]
Also known as "1". "蹑1" in traditional characters.
(1) Step on; step on.
(2) Wear shoes.
(3) Climbing; ascending.
(4) To; to go.
(5) Tracking; chasing.
(6) Transcend; surpass.
(7) Rolling.
(8) Follow the example.
(9) Connection; continuous.
(10) Refers to inheritance; inheritance.
(11) Raise the heel and walk on toes.
(12) The pedals of healds on ancient looms.
(13) Use the same "pinch".
(14) Use the same "photograph". Uncovered.
chase
